name: iDart: 3 Minute Platformer Challenge
description:
It Draws A Red Triangle. Click the image above^ and press any key to start.

You only have 3 minutes total to beat the game.

The whole game will explode in 3 minutes, all you have to do is press all three buttons and get back to the start without dying.

Made in 3 hours for TriJam#33

using the themes: Triangles, 3 minutes, 3 buttons

Uses the buttons Left, Right, and Up (or W, A, and D)

The number of blue triangles on your character is your number of jumps. It goes up every time you press one of the buttons. You lose all jump and button progress when you die.
